opinion.posture: Civil proceedings. Trespass. Before WALSH, J. No. 2470 Oct. T., 1979. Appeal from the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Lackawanna County, Civil Division, No. 207, Nov. T., 1972. Argued June 12, 1980.
opinion.attorneys: Peter G. Loftus, for appellant; John P. Pesota, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before HESTER, CAVANAUGH and VAN der VOORT, JJ.
